tags.description: Primitive campsites. Camping at designated sites only, except in the Moscow Hill Assembly where there is room for RVs and trailers. Picnic tables and fire pits. Cherry Ridge has potable water. Campsites first-come, first-served basis.
tags.name: Moscow Hill Assembly Area
tags.note: Horse stables. No horse camping November 1 to April 30. Off-road trails closed to horses and mountain bikes from November 1 to April 30.
